title: Need 50 rp for Sir Kled
body:
i worked very hard on this picture :D
Edit: i felt that Kled as a character is almost perfect, but is lacking culture, so I decided to give him a fez

replies.body: This is such a cool art, I love the shadow effects. :D  It looks like a specialist was able to help out with this already! :D
